roleset.name: flowing or being forced from a vessel

example.name: extravasate-v
example.text: During blood-brain barrier opening serum IgG could be extravasated

example.name: extravasation-n
example.text: The extravasation of cancer chemotherapeutic agents is an unwanted and distressing situation that can easily occur

example.name: extravasation-n
example.text: ... in consequence of the backward flow of blood from the veins and its extravasation from the capillaries.
When this is impossible and retention of urine or its extravasation from rupture of the dilated portion of the canal back of the stricture or from pyogenic infection occurs...
example.arg: from rupture of the dilated portion of the canal back of the stricture or from pyogenic infection
